basic.description: Complex arithmetic, complex plane. Differentiation, analytic functions. Elementary functions. Contour integration, Cauchy's Theorem, and Integral Formula. Taylor and Laurent series, residues with applications to evaluation of integrals.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Complex Analysis

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: APSC 171, APSC 172, APSC 174, and registered in BSCE.
